item.description:
Hey, y'all...

OK call it a LATE Happy Hour...

Four groups including two blazin' Texas- style rock bands with Willie J. Law Band (9:10 PM) & Throwdown Band (11:30 PM) ....All for a $10 cover charge. Bands start at 8PM until 1 AM.

http://www.reverbnation.com/throwdown

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TgU1ecgmiKk&feature=related

Inspirations seem to be Albert Collins & Jimmy Ray Vaughn for the Throwdown, & Bo Diddley & Albert King for the Willie J Law Blues band.

The other two groups are: the Fran Dagostino band (8:00 PM) & A Ton of Blues (10:20 PM).

THIS MEETUP IS CO-POSTED TO 4 GROUPS! SOCIAL FUN, FUN WITH ALCOHOL, FACEBOOK, so as we get lots a people comin'!

What's good about Hard Rock Cafe is, not everyone likes every group, so you can go into the other room & talk if you want to ... we can also meetup between sets.

Tickets can be bought online at

http://flemingentertainment.ticketleap.com/blues-bash--hard-rock-cafe-cavern-club/

Just choose one-- your favorite (I'm choosin' Throwdown).

Otherwise come early if you need a ticket, this will sell out. Doors open at 7:30.

HUH!? WEBSITE SAYS YOU MUST WEAR BLUE TO GET IN..!http://www.hardrock.com/locations/cafes3/events.aspx?LocationID=101&MIBenumID=3

 

Seems like Haymarket T (Green Line) is the best bet.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a Crocodile Dundee hat
item.name: Texas Style Rock @ Hard Rock Cafe
